page.title: 19(CONT.) JOBS / FUEL
page.content:
{The greatest change}in the area has been in{employment.}Only{one}of our families is employed in{farming, one in{horticulture}and{one}in{partridge {breeding.}Other jobs mentioned are teacher, toy manufacturer, doctor's receptionist, civil servant, milkman, managers, child minder, butcher, hairdresser, police constable and secretary. Nineteen people were retired, eight of them living on their own.Of families with{children the{average number}is{two.
There does not seem to be much unemployment in this area.
{Cooking}is mainly by electricity, as gas is not piped beyond Areley Kings and houses are{heated}almost equally by {electricity, solid fuel, calor gas {and oil.
